On this page

# Function: createChart()

> **createChart**(`container`, `options`?):
> [`IChartApi`](../interfaces/IChartApi.html)

This function is the simplified main entry point of the Lightweight
Charting Library with time points for the horizontal scale.

## Parameters[​](createChart.html#parameters "Direct link to Parameters"){.hash-link aria-label="Direct link to Parameters"} {#parameters .anchor .anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7}

• **container**: `string` \| `HTMLElement`

ID of HTML element or element itself

• **options?**: [`DeepPartial`](../type-aliases/DeepPartial.html)
\<[`TimeChartOptions`](../interfaces/TimeChartOptions.html)\>

Any subset of options to be applied at start.

## Returns[​](createChart.html#returns "Direct link to Returns"){.hash-link aria-label="Direct link to Returns"} {#returns .anchor .anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7}

[`IChartApi`](../interfaces/IChartApi.html)

An interface to the created chart

  .toc-highlight}
- [Returns](createChart.html#returns){.table-of-contents__link
  .toc-highlight}
